shortdesc.ph: Used to configure the parameters of a specific layer in multi-quality video streams.

section.p: This struct is used to configure the parameters of a specific layer in multi-layer video streams, including resolution, frame rate, and whether to enable the video stream of this layer.

ul.li: : Enables the video stream of the current layer.
: (Default) Disables the video stream of the current layer.
: Enables the video stream of the corresponding layer.
: (Default) Disables the video stream of the corresponding layer.

plentry.pd:
Specifies whether to enable the video stream of the corresponding layer. The default value is .
: Enables the video stream of the corresponding layer.
: (Default) Disables the video stream of the corresponding layer.
